Bash(git -C /home/g/dev/orangecat commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Integrate multi-wallet system into profile pages

Changes:
- Add WalletManager to ModernProfileEditor for wallet management
- Display categorized wallets on public profile pages with goals
- Fetch wallets via /api/wallets endpoint
- Add CRUD handlers (add, update, delete, refresh)
- Keep legacy Bitcoin address display for backward compatibility
- Install bitcoin-address-validation and bs58check for validation

Features:
- Users can manage up to 10 wallets per profile
- Each wallet has category (üè† Rent, üçî Food, etc.)
- Goal tracking with progress bars
- Balance display with refresh capability
- Copy address to clipboard
- Empty state prompts users to add wallets

ü§ñ Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
